parameters: A weapon that fires bullets. Can be charged with
up to 9 bullets in its circular chamber.
\C[3]A card with Keymaster written on it.
It reads: "This is a key to the exit.
You will die if someone learns of this card."
\C[3]A note with some names, including Prof. Mishima.
There's also the name Alice Yabusame.
\.\C[4](It's a machine for shredding documents and such...
There are lots of shredded pieces inside.)
Probably just a waste of time to check it all, huh?"
all this paper would be very time-consuming.)
\."...Maybe Gin's startin' to regain his spirits, too."
